note:
Media/Tech scholar @USCAnnenberg researching perception and persuasion effects in emerging media forms. Will sometimes write comprehensible stuff too, bylines in Slate, NBC, Vice (US) Politiken and Rec (DK).

Recovering startup upstart and tech schmo. Also recovering from acute political operator syndrome with co-pathological stratcommitis.

I have a neurodivergence and I'm not afraid to use it!
